# map(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a new column of typed values by applying the given thread-safe transform to every non-missing element of this untyped column.

## Declaration

```swift
func map<T>(_ lazyTransform: @escaping (MLDataValue) -> T) -> MLDataColumn<T> where T : MLDataValueConvertible
```

## Parameters

- **lazyTransform**: A thread-safe element transformation function. The implementation of the transform you provide should accept an `Element` of the column and return a transformed value of a type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataValueConvertible].

## Return Value

A new `MLDataColumn` typed to the return type of `lazyTransform`.

## Transforming elements to generate a data column

- **map(_:)**: Creates a new column of typed values by applying the given thread-safe transform to every non-missing element of this untyped column.
- **map(_:)**: Creates a new column of typed values, potentially with missing values, by applying the given thread-safe transform to every non-missing element of this untyped column.
- **mapMissing(_:)**: Creates a new column of typed values by applying the given thread-safe transform to every element of this untyped column, including missing elements.
